articles.title: Controversial remaster Ark: Survival Ascended has been delayed to October and will now be slightly cheaper - Rock Paper Shotgun
articles.description: Ark: Survival Evolved's remaster has been delayed, and will now be in early access until late 2024, which is when Ark 2 plans to release.
articles.content: Studio Wildcard have once again revised plans for Ark: Survival Ascended, the remastered version of dino survival sim Ark: Survival Evolved. The Unreal Engine 5 edition has now slightly adjusted its … [+1766 chars]

articles.title: Detection of the cosmological time dilation of high-redshift quasars - Nature.com
articles.description: A Bayesian-based analysis of 190 cosmologically distant quasars, photometrically observed over two decades, has revealed the long-expected presence of cosmic time dilation owing to the expansion of space imprinted on their variability.

articles.description: Red Bull says a “no risk, no reward” mantra preached by late owner Dietrich Mateschitz helped prompt Max Verstappen’s late fastest lap gamble in Formula 1’s Austrian Grand Prix.
